alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 11:52AM PST until February 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches except locally up to 12 inches in the mountains. Ice accumulations around a light glaze possible. * WHERE...Plain and Leavenworth. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow is expected to develop this evening and continue overnight. Snow may mix with rain Monday morning, with local patches of freezing rain possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
